H0.text: Which indoor sport includes a side wall, front wall, and a tin. Racquetball

H1.text: Which indoor sport includes a side wall, front wall, and a tin. Handball

H2.text: Which indoor sport includes a side wall, front wall, and a tin. Paddleball

H3.text: Which indoor sport includes a side wall, front wall, and a tin. Squash

A4.text: The bottom line of the front wall marks the top of the 'tin', a half meter-high metal area.

A5.text: The court's four walls are divided into a front wall, two side walls, and a back wall.
